events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product is not what I purchased.
The issue was classified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery reported by the customer.
Support agent Alice has been assigned to handle the refund case and will follow up shortly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I'm here to help get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can process your refund?
I have attached the photo of the incorrect item and my order number is 123456. Please let me know how to proceed.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund within 3 business days and send you a return label for the incorrect product.
That sounds great, thank you for your prompt response. I'll await the refund and return instructions.
The refund has been processed successfully and the return label was emailed to you. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if the return went smoothly. We're here if you have any other questions.
As there has been no further response, this case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support, have a great day!
